name: El Desafío del Mago
description:
You have to complete the magician's challenge, going through different levels that will increase in difficulty as you progress. You will see a world full of absurd and funny elements and at the same time you will complete the story.

Game made by "Victor Rosas", "Fernando Arellano", "Oscar Abarca" and "Franco Guraní" for the Andrés Bello University

Victor Rosas: Programming, Level Design, UI/UX. 

Franco Guraní: SFX, Music. 

Fernando Arellano: Art & Models. 

Oscar Abarca: Video Editing.
